meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class BCC

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.MultilabelClassifier
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CCe
            • meka.classifiers.multilabel.BCC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BCC

    public class BCC
extends CCe
    BCC.java - Bayesian Classifier Chains. Probably would be more aptly called Bayesian Classifier Tree. Creates a maximum spanning tree based on marginal label dependence; then employs a CC classifier. The original paper used Naive Bayes as a base classifier, hence the name.
    See Zaragoza et al. "Bayesian Classifier Chains for Multi-dimensional Classification. IJCAI 2011.
    Version:
    June 2013
    Author:
    Jesse Read
    See Also:
